title: Calculus of a piecewise defined function part - b

content.description: Let f be a function defined by f(x)={2x−x2 for x ≤ 1, x2+ kx +p for x>1.
content.question: For the values of k and p found in part (a), on what interval or intervals is f increasing?

frqParts.text: For the values of k and p found in part (a), on what interval or intervals is f increasing?

topic.text: 5.3: Determining Intervals on Which a Function Is Increasing or Decreasing

skill.text: Skill 2.E: Describe the relationships among different representations of functions and their derivatives.
